name: Bunny Prison Break
description: Break out of prison in this fast-paced and brutal retro-styled roguelite. Incarcerated in a concentration camp by odious Swine invaders, you have to shoot your way out to freedom. Blast through hordes of enemies and fullfill your quest for revenge.

name: Yugowave
description: Dystopian, abandoned, industrial space. What you hear: war speeches from Yugoslavia. What you see: TV screens with retro Yugoslavian music videos.

name: Corporate Lockdown
description: Trapped alone in the underground mining facility, the out-of-control security robots are frantically knocking on the iron door behind you. You have no choice but to continue to go deeper, even if the source of all the chaos comes from deeper...

name: One-Thousand Cuts
description: One-Thousand Cuts is a samurai action side-scroller with cinematic action and instant-death combat. Hack and slash your way through the infamous Army of One-Thousand and reclaim your rightful place as daimyo.

name: Eternals' Path
description: Eternals’ Path is a roguelike, tactical turn-based RPG about struggles and poor choices you made and had during your life that will haunt you in death. Incarnate anti-heroes through different places. Fight those who wander there, but also people you knew in your life with lots of grievances to share

name: Kiborg
description: Kiborg is a fast-paced, story-driven action game with rogue-lite encounters. Each challenge is unique and the narrative always moves forward, win or lose. Become an unstoppable war machine and face the consequences of your actions as you lead a resistance group on a faraway prison planet.

name: Backrooms: Wit's End
description: Backrooms: Wit's End is an immersive coop survival horror game, featuring dreadful spaces and dynamic gameplay mechanics. Explore the different levels with your friends, while trying to escape from many puzzling entities.

name: Tiny Dungeons
description: Your party left you for dead, but a mysterious figure called 'The fortune teller' reanimated you... A sprawling labyrinth, hoards of enemies, and elite bosses stand between you and freedom. Alone, you don't stand a chance, but with the help of The Fortune Teller, you might just make it...

name: Cold and Afraid
description:
In the tranquil confines of a college town, an idyllic peace is shattered by the brutal murder of a student. Shocked and alarmed, the local authorities soon uncover a chilling truth:

​this ghastly act is merely the tip of the iceberg.

As a grim pattern emerges with each successive discovery of mutilated bodies, it becomes evident that a cunning serial killer is haunting the town, leaving a trail of terror in their wake.

name: Tsukichi Chronicles
description: Tsukichi is a captivating game that'll keep you entertained for hours. With its blend of story, combat, and exploration, you are sure to have an incredible experience. So, if you're looking for an action RPG with an engaging story, intense combat, and beautiful scapes, Tsukichi is perfect for you!

name: It Is Ticking
description: The world is being attacked by terrorists, they use highly dangerous explosive devices to cause massive destruction in urban zones. You, A bomb-defusing expert, must take action to protect our nation's lives.

name: Wildstrive
description: Wildstrive - is an open-world first-person survival game. Craft tools, build a camp, harvest crops, explore the land, tame and fight wild animals. Challenge nature and solve the mystery of the lost island!

name: Through the Mist
description: A terrible disease known as the Blight is spreading across all four corners of the world. Without a cure, he who is afflicted by it, is doomed. As the Lighwielder, Edan must now find it's origin and cause and put it to an end. He is people's last hope.

name: MoonWool
description: MoonWool is a sheep herding game in a space cartoon universe. You must save your sheep stranded in the cosmos ! On tiny planet, you will have to guide them into safety, against dangerous hazard and monsters !

name: Emiline: The Ghost of White Willow
description: A psychological horror VR game. Taking place during the events of D-day, find yourself trapped in the gothic horrors of White Willow Manor Hall. Follow your sections lieutenant into combat before fighting a new battle of survival in the dark haunted past of the house.

name: Viking Invaders
description: A turn-based strategy game! Enjoy a fun local PvP tactical battles with up to 4 friends and family!Invade and capture enemy defenses.Beware! This game may cause you to loose friends!

name: Charge!
description: Charge! Lead your elite squad to advance! Use dozens of weapons, armor sets, and relics to create a variety of gameplay styles and eliminate endless enemies!

name: Konike
description: Konike is a turn-based strategy RPG about hunting ghosts for money. Play as a man down on his luck as he uses probability-powered Finder devices to locate invisible spirits in rural America. Use both your skill and intuition to survive, all while uncovering the mystery of your own past and future.

name: The Last Seal
description: When a presumed to be extinct race starts wreaking havoc, Joan and Cadel begin what will be the journey of their lives.

name: Flying Carpets Over Shark Infested Waters
description: Combat and survival. Escape from the Death Maze and from Rat Island. Defeat the pirates in aerial combat, while sharks swim below. Board the pirate ship and steal their gold. Everyone and everything is out to get you. Get them first. In the final scene find and terminate your nemesis. The parrots.

name: Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX: Signature Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Western Rye
description: Welcome to the harsh and lawless world of the Wild West, where a mysterious fever called the 'Rye Fever' has turned the once-proud frontier into a lawless wasteland. In this world, survival is the only law, and you'll need to be tough, quick-witted, and deadly if you hope to make it out alive.

name: Bay Lynx
description: Clever, fast, and fun. Bay Lynx honors the mascot platformer formula with classic gameplay mechanics and smartly designed levels.

name: Cuphead: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Omins
description: Lead your faction of omins in fantastic worlds, build their villages, train their skills, satisfy their needs, and send them to war! Will you save them from the destruction deity Nefasto and his hordes of Gormuns? Play the role of a deity in this real-time strategy inspired by the classic god games.

name: Bewitched Balls
description: Bewitched Balls is partly a "color matching" like puzzle game and partly a turn-based combat game set in a world of magic and fantasy where your goal is to defuse six evil gems and finally fight against a powerful witch.

name: Cargo Delivery
description: In the game, you become a driver of a car that carries various goods to remote villages, located in snowy areas.

name: Void Warden
description: Void Warden is a unique mix of Turn-Based Combat and Tower Defence. Build a powerful roster of guardians from the last survivors of a doomed world. Customise and co-ordinate your party in order to defend against apocalyptic horrors. Can you hold back the darkness?

name: Isegyemeideu
description: Mansion Made Love Simulation Game

name: RogueStone 2: Open World
description: Experience the Ultimate Role-Playing Game with RogueStone 2: Open World. Explore the depths of the Core, uncover the secrets of the Gurus, and discover the 9 Meta Orbs to become the Master of this world. Will you overcome the challenges and vanquish the Consuming Darkness?

name: Occult Club: Gathering Fo(u)r Fatal Stories
description: A horror mystery adventure game with ghost story elements. They say if three people gather at 4:00 AM on April 4th and finish telling three horror stories, a fourth participant—the evil spirit in the story—will appear. You attend such a gathering, but the initiator seems to be up to something...

name: Groob
description: Embark on a challenging roguelike adventure, mastering tactical deck-building and intricate strategies as you explore unknown dungeons. Build your powerful deck, adapt to changing enemies, and utilize cards and items for victory.

name: Anisto
description: A vessel of humanity's last hope must forge a new home planet by excavating ore from asteroids, refining alloys, and fending off rival Harvesters. A "ship shooter" without bullets or weapons, Anisto rethinks the genre with unique tools and scenarios that test decision making, not just reflexes.

name: 9th Land
description: 9th Land is a family co-op multiplayer action-adventure game set in a fantasy world with elements of community simulation.

name: HotWire VR
description: Complete every wire as fast as you can without touching them!

name: Underwater Cities
description: The official digital port of the tabletop game which won 2019 Diamant d’Or – top expert strategy game. This digital version adds online multiplayer and AI opponents.

name: FlyBye
description: "FlyBye" is an emotional adventure game where you play as Harold, a WW1 veteran fulfilling his wife's final wish. Take her ashes on a journey across a stunning world, encountering old memories and creating new ones. Explore, overcome challenges, and discover the true meaning of life and love.

name: Plantsportation
description: Install operational modules on your rocket and program them to deliver plants to the target.

name: Crimson Hollow
description: Crimson Hollow is a cozy fantasy game set in a magical town, kept secret from the outside world. In this game, you will play as a hero who discovers this mysterious village inhabited by magical villagers.

name: A Night in Omar's Burger
description: Work together, trust no one! Get ready for a night of burger flipping and zombie slaying in A Night In Omar's Burger! With waves of undead attackers and a traitor in your midst, can you and your friends survive until morning? Fight for your survival in this 4-8 person multiplayer game.

name: A Pretty Broken Adventure
description: A PRETTY BROKEN ADVENTURE is a solo-developed, hand-drawn classic point-and-click adventure game. Embark on a crazy journey into a vibrant fantasy world where anything seems possible - except getting a decent cup of coffee - oh.... and reuniting with your friends to finally return home.

name: Precision of Insight
description: 2D puzzle platformer with a lot of puzzles that will push your intelligence and problem-solving skills to the limit.

name: Insect Wars
description: Insect Wars is a real-time strategy game where you lead an army of insects. Collect resources, build your colony, and destroy the enemy's to win. Scout the enemy, master different unit types and technologies, and face off in 1v1 or team-up against the AI.

name: Unioverse Proving Grounds
description: Unioverse Proving Grounds is a third-person shooter, speedrun mode within our alpha Hero Viewer. Sprint, shoot, slash through fun obstacles and top the weekly leaderboard for rewards.

name: Destiny Summoner
description:
Destiny Summoner, the latest Idle strategy RPG from DH Games, is coming to your phone!
Start your adventure of redemption in the shattered world of Destiny Summoner!
Lead your team of heroes venture deep into a continent of mystery and save the world from demons and darkness.

name: Giant Defense
description: The most challenging tower defense game to date, real-time control 3D perspective, multiple enemy intelligent attack routes! 8 types of towers, each with unique special abilities.25 challenging levels to conquer!Over 10 powerful enemies to challenge your command abilities.

name: Combat Medic
description: Combat Medic is a top-down 2D game where you play as a combat medic. Traverse the battlefield avoiding the hale of incoming enemy fire, make use of your medical tools and use your knowledge to save the lives of fallen soldiers before they succumb to one of their many possible injuries.

name: Heroes Quest Survival
description: Embark on an exciting journey in Heroes Quest Survival. Unite with fellow heroes to liberate lands from monstrous orcs and zombies. Master the art of swordplay and sorcery to rescue innocent lives in this thrilling quest.

name: Mogrimera: Disciple of Order
description: Explore across the land and create your very own grimera!

name: Villaging
description: Villaging is a simple game of strategy where you reign on a kingdom and you need to manage your ressources and your inhabitant .But you will also get threat from other kingdom so you will need to make an army to fight against them .

name: Tiny Frightened
description: Tiny Frightened: a thrilling multiplayer game where you and your friends become voodoo dolls in a tiny and terrifying world, evading an evil pursuer. Help your friends and sew their eyes back on... and their eyes are buttons! Find valves to open the exit and escape.

name: AngelStrike
description: AngelStrike is an exciting 2D side-scrolling shoot'em'up with handmade pixel-art and a variety of action-packed missions. Play solo or local co-op with friends to rescue refugees, stealthily deliver supplies, escort your allies, and take down hordes of machines in 40 levels across 5 different areas!

name: Beyond the Plastic Wall
description: Beyond the Plastic Wall is an atmosphere dense narrative exploration of isolation, love and the search for human connection set in the shadow of an ageless city.

name: Hill Dig: The Boring Adventure
description: Hill Dig is a digging adventure game where you will have to explore a world full of exciting and challenging puzzles in a variety of different biomes with a custom built vehicule. Explore a 2D voxel world, solve more than a hundred puzzles, improve your vehicule and go always deeper.

name: Liminal Lands
description: Liminal Lands is a poetic journey through a hybrid reality where sun, salt, wind, water algae and bacteria collide. Based on fieldwork from the salt marshes of southern France, the artwork explores otherwise unseen macro- and microscopic ecosystems of the wetlands.

name: Runaway Farm
description: Runaway to Skipping Rock and reclaim your Grandma’s farm. You’re going to need to get crops in the ground, harvest and sell lumber, make a fishing pole and catch some fresh fish, and sell weekly at the Farmers Market!

name: Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe
description: Experience the challenges and triumphs of leading a tribe in Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe. Explore, mine, hunt, and build your way to success. Customizable buildings, resource management, and population growth make every playthrough unique.

name: Escape from Garbage House
description: Cleaners undertake the cleanup with a physical operation that involves dumping trash with both hands. Depending on your attitude toward the job, you may get crows or police visits Clean the house through conversation!

name: DragonShift
description: Embark on an epic adventure with DragonShift, a unique turn-based Fantasy-Adventure-RPG with hundreds of dungeons to explore, lots of puzzles, decision-driven campaigns and fun online modes that let you measure your skills with players from around the world.

name: Ground of Aces
description: The base building game that lets you take command of a remote air base of workers and pilots during World War II.

name: Porpetha
description: An action, adventure and musical game. Perfect for hanging out and having fun.

name: Hundred Acre Wood
description: Explore and survive a twisted Hundred Acre Wood while being hunted by an old childhood friend, Winnie-the-Pooh. Rescue Christopher Robin with the help of Eldritch Beasts that were once familiar faces. Discover what took place and has changed a once beautiful land into something dark and dangerous.

name: Illegal Excavation
description: Welcome to the exciting journey. In order to stand up, you will witness the adventures he lived in his mysterious treasures. You will be challenged! Getting caught in booby traps or your enemies will be a real journey where you must find their treasures and Discover their mysteries by solving clues.

name: Sea Chronicles
description: Sea Chronicles - is a first person comedy-adventure game where you're lost at sea. You try to find a way back home, but start to notice that you might not be alone on the ship. Is someone sabotaging your escape, or are you going insane?

name: Escaping Atlantis
description: Escaping Atlantis is a roguelite deckbuilder where all your cards are unique Atlanteans. Get to know them, direct them in tactical battles and strengthen your team to face bigger challenges, all with the hope of.. Escaping Atlantis!

name: Music Summoner
description: Music-themed bullet-hell shooting for beginners to advanced users

name: Dungeon Seekers
description: Dungeon Seekers is a multiplayer VR dungeon adventure RPG featuring drop-in cooperative play, realistic physic interactions, engaging combat and climbing mechanics. Team up with your friends to fight monsters, loot treasures and upgrade & customize your equipment.

name: Camplandia
description: Build and manage a thriving summer camp. Hire staff and provide activities for campers as you grow your revenue and reputation. Unlock new facilities and camp activities to bring your dream camp to life in this immersive simulation.

name: Bloody Doctor
description: Bloody Doctor is an Action RPG. Control a Doctor facing an epidemic by extracting organs. Fight ennemies and operate on corpses at your lab. Explore an old Steampunk Paris during a strange period.

name: Jets A Blazin'
description: An exploration game with jetpacks and a variety of guns, all in the stunning immersive world of VR! Chill, low stakes, and semi-destructive, it's the perfect game for stress relief and satisfying your inner child.

name: Starshapes
description: Uncover new constellations and re-light the stars by connecting colorful Starshapes. Create unique and beautiful solutions to abstract three-dimensional puzzles and experience the calm of outer space.

name: Star Quest
description: Star Quest is a third person single player game that integrates space exploration, flight driving, action puzzle solving, and gunfight shooting. The game is developed with Unreal Engine 5 . In the vast universe, you can start this exciting journey by driving your own spaceship.

name: Interlopers
description: Interlopers is a solo-developed FPS inspired by retro classics. Wield big guns, shoot hordes of enemy robots, and explore hand-crafted levels set on multiple alien worlds.

name: Mayor May Knott
description: A creepy-cozy 3D adventure, about a shy girl who accidentally becomes mayor of a haunted ghost town.

name: Mirth Island
description: You're about to embark on an epic adventure with a young duck who's tired of feeling sad all the time. He's packed his bags, set sail on a rickety boat, and is headed straight for Mirth Island - a place where happiness is said to grow wild like daisies!

name: Abyssal
description: Dive into "Abyssal," a deep-sea horror game where you pilot a cutting-edge diving suit. Brave the abyss, confront fears, gather resources, and unravel hidden secrets in a haunting, immersive world.

name: Dojo Assault
description: A scientific experiment to create the ultimate modern samurai is taking place ! Battle to create the unsurpassed warrior ninja assassin in the cloning dojo! Cut, stab and shoot your way to shinobi excellence !

name: Crown of Light
description: Beatrice has trained her whole life for this day, even if she never imagined it would really come. Brave, naive and determined, she will face the trials of her life to fulfill her destiny.

name: The Black Door
description: The Black Door is a short and sweet horror point and click game. Players take on the role of a nameless protagonist who finds themselves trapped in a mysterious and sinister location. With a new take on the genre, utilizing new technology to allow a deeper more rich environmental exploration.

name: The Hostel: Night Terrors
description: In this game, you will find yourself in a hostel in the middle of a mysterious forest. You will discover terrifying and mysterious things, from murders to challenging puzzles. Use your skills to uncover the hidden secrets in the hostel. Get ready for an exciting and hair-raising experience!

name: Prophecy Island
description: Prophecy Island is a randomly generated open world action rpg. As the player you get the opportunity to start an entirely new adventure every playthrough, with a remixed main storyline, generated side-quest lines, a new island, new dungeons and so much more.

name: Topple the Tower
description: Topple the Tower is a rouge-like bullet hell where you travel from room to room, slowly ascending the tower. Spacetime distorts inside it and it is teeming with strange creatures, hellbent on turning you into their dinner. The tower must go down.

name: Momatron
description: Enemies have landed on your planet and brought a Big Bomb with them, which they intend to use to destroy your planet. Your task is to stop them!

name: Space Saga
description: Space Saga is a universe in which you can control your own ship, travel on it and expand your possessions. You have to make difficult decisions, act on the world stage and create the world with your own hands. What choice will you make?

name: Helping Ani
description: Helping Ani is an psychological-horror RPG game, where you play as Hajime, a boy who has to take something to his girlfriend, Ani. But be careful, the forest will be full of strange and curious foes!

name: Forty Foes
description: Pugilists prepare, The battle is about to begin...Forty Foes is a side-scrolling action adventure Beat 'em up in the style of classics like Double Dragon Battle Toads and Turtles in Time.

name: Flayl
description: Flayl is a raid based survival extraction looter shooter with physics, built in Unreal Engine 5. Setup your gear, join a raid, fight for your life against up to 50-100 other players & Kovaak's wildlife using weapons, skills/abilities, physics, & do your best to stay alive in deadly weather.

name: Clomper
description: Drive your mechnical ladybird across a procedural hellscape by building pipes to power machines with steam. Explore from inside the submarine-like Clomper: collecting resources, completing quests and repairing damage. Go solo or with a friend with co-op multiplayer.

name: Kilager
description: After WWIII, nuclear and biochemical weapons devastated most of the planet. But humanity survived, and survivors formed KILAGER, a city nurturing the last civilization 70 years later. Unfortunately, humans cannot escape their nature...

name: After the Turn
description: After the Turn is an immersive, atmospheric, survival horror game, with a story. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Path of Disdain
description: Witness the unfolding of a dark fantasy tale of meeting your "Heroes". When your words fall onto deaf ears...maybe its time to make the ultimate sacrifice for the greater good.

name: The Doll
description: Lucy bought an exquisite large doll at a low price. While she combs its hair and chats with it, Little does she know that her nightmare is about to begin...

name: Tiling Towers
description: Tiling Towers is a Tower Defense game, where you expand a predetermined path and survive waves of increasingly stronger enemies and bosses. Choose from 3 randomly generated cards every few waves to unlock new towers and bonuses. Can you protect the Crimson Crystal from destruction?

name: The Mighty Claw
description: Attach your titular Mighty Claw grappling hook to countless targets, including walls, ceilings, chronically bored pet elephants or gigantic guinea pigs that stretch by their butt! Explore a colorful 2D cartoon world, feel creative with your hook and get ready to swing, spin, grab and throw!

name: ShellShot Arena
description: ShellShot Arena is a fast-paced, top-down, online multiplayer game from the 'ShellShock Live' universe. Master a massive arsenal of upgradable weapons to be the last tank standing in Team, Free-For-All, and Battle Royale matches.

name: Missile City AeroLeague
description: Missile City AeroLeague is a little like Street Fighter and a lot like Windjammers. Now with 40% more Sports Magick!

name: Stryke
description: The future is bleak, its Universe hostile, and not your friend. Mercilessly Tactical, Turn-Based Base-Building Strategy. Pick one of four Factions and develop a battleplan against or with players around the Globe, in a fight against a relentless rogue AI. There is not much Time.

name: Whale Rock Games: Immersive Puzzles Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Whale Rock: All Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Holy Journey of Salvation
description: Holy Journey of Salvation is a cinematic Immersive Sim FPS. As the Spirit Ascender, you must embark on a Holy Journey to ascend in the Holy Chamber! In this Post Apocalypse setting, your tribe has deep understanding of Chemistry... but did they get it right in all the wrong ways?

name: Gundroid
description: Earth is in danger in this classic Run N' Gun action spectacle inspired by the glory days of gaming from the late 80s and 90s! Take control of G.U.N.N.R and and battle your way through hordes of enemies and boss fights accompanied by a rocking soundtrack.

name: Astro Engineers
description: Astro Engineers is a co-op puzzle game for both virtual reality and desktop where you have to solve puzzles, work together and explore to complete different missions.

name: Caved-in
description: Welcome to Caved-in, a crazy, cute, and colorful parallel universe full of exploration and combat. Interact with cute and funny NPC's that will help you in your effort to escape the caverns of Quarry-135.

name: Blue Epic
description: Blue Epic is an ocean survival game where players can play marine creatures to survive; Complete control system included in the game

name: Vicious Red
description: Vicious Red is a third person survival-horror game that stays true to the genre's best traditions. Set in an alternate universe of the recent past, the game takes place on a space station overrun by a terrifying virus. Players must fight for their lives as they face off against unimaginable horrors.

name: Rhythm Lust Girl 2
description: Rhythm Lust Girl 2 is a casual puzzle game. There are 24 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Mortified
description: Mortified is multiplayer horror co-op game playing 1-8 players find all the objects to make disappear the creature that wants to kill everything it sees ! Weclome to the hell .

name: Comet Culling
description:
Comet Culling is a retro inspired, pixel art farming simulator set in space.

Join PR1NC3, a little helper android, as they travel through space in a plant-powered ship. Their battery is running low and the only way to charge it is to stop on a deserted planet and farm their fuel.

Discover alien species of plants, talk to a mysterious merchant that decided to stop by, read the logs saved on the ship and reveal what happened to PR1NC3 and their crew!

name: Eclipse Survivors
description: Experience the ultimate challenge in Eclipse Survivors, a bullet-hell / area shooter game featuring epic bosses inspired by classic 16-bit titles. Collect XP gems, master unique skills, and dodge countless enemy bullets as you face off against hordes of foes. Will you survive the eclipse?

name: Western War
description: Western War - This is a 2D rail shooter with a top-down view of shooting enemies, with each level their number and speed increase, and you must use two revolvers to shoot enemies and reload the revolvers in time so as not to end up in the pit for the dead.

name: Married Girls' Night School
description: Becoming friends with married girls at a night school!? This is a mature adolescent novel about night time, school, and married girls!

name: Surviving Soldier
description: Surviving Soldier - Platform runner with arcade elements. In this game, you need to help a soldier get to his own. The enemy does not sleep and conducts pinpoint shelling. Try not to hit your head, it will be fatal to you.

name: Curious Fishing
description: Sin descripción

name: Apple Quest Monsters DX
description: Over 100 pages containing 85 lovingly crafted sprites and descriptions of monsters, a map, photos and more; all from a non existant RPG, inspired by my childhood love of reading strategy guides for games I never played.

name: The Dark Pictures: Volume 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Safari Chef
description:
Join our cooking chef all over the world and feed the animals! Help the chef with cooking food for the animals in this physics based game. Draw a line and drop the food on the right spot so the animals can get their favourite food.
Everyone can enjoy Safari Chef! Kids, adults and the whole family. If you like physics based games, food puzzles or cooking games, this game is for you! Help our chef and feed many animals around the world. Test your brain and help the animals get their favorite food.
Safari Chef is a game in which physics are important. Make sure to drop the food on the right spot! There are 90 different levels and each one of them is a fun puzzle the you’ll have to solve. Download for free one of the best cooking chef games with levels.

name: Cuboid Stack
description: Place blocks and built a tower as high as you can!

name: Space Dodger 2019: Arcade Wars
description:
Space Dodger 2019 - is a fun online space arcade game. It is a game perfect to kill time.
Well, cosmonaut, that's the future, you are now a lonely space explorer, all you have is your spaceship and skills to drive it. In the galaxy, you will meet aliens and you will be plunged in the battle of worlds. Dodge alien attacks and use their weapons against them!

name: Word Tracky
description:
Word Tracky is the game where you drag and swipe to hunt for the nine letter words. Set over a range of different animated environments, use powerups to help seek out all the words, including special cash and bonus words.
Relaxing and addictive, Word Tracky can also be played in a more fast paced way to achieve combos and high scores.

name: Wheelie Life
description: Welcome to Wheelie Life 2, the best online wheelie game yet. Enjoy the online mode, where you can create or join rooms to play with your friends and more players.

name: Demon Scrolls
description: Stop the Primagen before he can find the Demon Scrolls to usher in an Age of Darkness in this Single Player RPG

name: Vikings Hnefatafl: Kings of the Dark Age
description: In the late 8th century, Anglo-Saxon Britain faces a threat like none before: northmen from across the seas, also called Vikings. In Vikings Hnefatafl: Kings of the Dark Age, you will be leading either the Vikings or the Saxons into battle by means of turn-based strategy.

name: Our Last Dayz
description: Our Last Dayz is an adventure game that will take you where you have never gone. Fight along side Vampires, Werewolves and Zombies to stop Lilith from her destructive plan. Save yourself, Save the city, Save the Child.

name: Tricky Tracks 2010
description: Drive a four-wheel drive buggy over complicated, aerial tracks as quickly as possible while trying not to fall off. Includes a track editor.

name: Project Bloom
description: A turn based RPG rogue-like. Gain the tactical advantage with the Time-based battle system. Recruit, train and lead your heroes against the treacherous foes awaiting in the Dream Realm

name: Tenet of the Spark
description: Tenet of the Spark is a linear story-driven third-person action and stealth game with an engrossing plot.

name: Mafia Inc.
description: Sin descripción

name: PlayPark StreetBallers
description: Sin descripción

name: Traffic Tour Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Drag Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat Mp3
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Raid
description: Sin descripción

name: Ancient Village 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Long Way
description: Sin descripción

name: Beach Club Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Drill and Collect
description: Sin descripción

name: Soulworker Urban Strategy
description:
Co-op simulation played strategically.
Fight with soul workers against endless lootings and destructions for survival in ruined cities.

name: Helicopter Escape 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: My Sushi Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Jigsaws
description: Sin descripción

name: Eastpunk: Journey
description:
Eastpunk: Journey is an eastern fantasy RPG card game in which you will experience a fantastical story based on Journey to the West and embrace adventures in Grand Tang, a magnificent Eastern civilization in an industrialized world.
Thanks to the discovery of Mana, a new energy that allows humans to have power comparable with gods, the Kingdom of Grand Tang entered an unprecedented era of prosperity.
But everything has a price. As the manifestation of the dark side of this power breaks out and drives everything into madness, the seemingly thriving world starts to crumble.
In Eastpunk: Journey, you will play as the Seeker immune to Miasma journeying to the West to find salvation for a world that is losing control.

name: Farmers 2050
description:
Droughts occur, mortgage payments come due, and farm chores never stop. Discover what it really takes to feed the world.
Now you can create and manage a sustainable farm of your very own. Tend to crops; raise animals; and craft goods to trade, sell and donate in your local community all the while managing the three pillars of sustainability -- environment, economic and social.

name: Food Street: Restaurant Game
description:
Welcome to Food Street, a free restaurant and cafe management world!
You are the Master Chef of your own cafe, bakery, diner or restaurant!
Build and decorate the kitchen and restaurant of your dreams in a stunning 3D world and start cooking with a huge selection of fresh ingredients. Build a bakery to bake tasty dishes from all around the world, make street food, or create a 5-star restaurant that meets everyone’s appetite!
Visit friends, trade items with other my restaurant owners around cafe world and play together in friendly online competitions!
Keep all the customers in food town happy as you bake, cook and do even more in Food Street, your restaurant story in cafe land!

name: Planet Commander: Space Action
description:
Take part in interplanetary war in the distant future, when space flight is commonplace. You control a battlecruiser in fights with other users in multiplayer team battles.
In Planet Commander, you are the captain of an interstellar spaceship. Your galactic fleet starts out with a small cruiser, but as your space base develops, you’ll get to control battleships and even supermassive space cruisers!
Start with a small spaceship, but as your base grows and develops, you’ll graduate to commanding huge battleships and superheavy spaceships. Battle in a galaxy on fire online with real opponents in the multiplayer Space Wars game mode, and develop your space fleet.

name: Succubus: Red Goddess
description: Sin descripción

name: Doodle Truck 2
description: Everyone’s favorite trucking series rolls back into the App Store! Day or night, rain or shine, real truckers are always ready to truck, so pick up your load and deliver the goods! Just remember to buckle up, because it’s gonna be one wild ride!

name: Virgo and the Sparklings Game
description: Every choices is in your hand! Which option is the best for Virgo? Which partner is the most compatible for her? Choose and live the life of Virgo from the popular webcomic series Virgo and The Sparklings!

name: Danger Darrel: Airplane Rush
description:
"Danger Darrel" is here and needs your help to test his new airplanes in this fun 3D arcade action adventure game! He loves the thrill and pushing his beloved planes to their limits, flying through the narrowest paths and fulfilling his desire for adrenaline in a race against dropping fuel levels in a challenging canyon environment.
Fly as far as possible in the hostile and ever-changing endless canyon valley, confronted with dangerous obstacles you might not expect. Make sure to collect various items and that you do not run out of fuel as you manoeuvre through the valley and avoid scratches on you wings! Do you have what it takes to race to the top and become the master?
Your goal? Get as far as possible with the individual planes to become the master on the global leaderboards where you will race against your friends and compete against pilots, racers and aviation masterminds worldwide!

name: Crawl On One
description:
Put a block on the field. Match three blocks of the same color to remove.
Placed on the field the block. He move in directions until reaching an obstacle or a border. Match three or more block parts of the same color to remove them.

name: Quantum Galaxy
description: For the first time, experience the never before seen innovation of the mobile on-rails genre as Quantum Galaxy gives you the ability to Transform your spaceship in real-time via the use of space Pods and Stations. Watch as your ship morphs before your eyes from a tiny spacecraft, to a formidable star-fighter, to a massive MINI-BOSS! All this, combined with a unique use of friendly AI Wingmen to aid you on your new action-packed journey through the Quantum Galaxy.

name: Galaxy War: The New Colony
description:
Take more colonies to the victory of galaxy war. Take or lose them, it is your choice!
In the year 2123, explorers on the galaxy Jeus discovered the remains of an ancient spacefaring civilization. In the decades that followed, these mysterious artifacts revealed startling new technologies, enabling travel to the furthest start and to transform unimageable powerful weapons more than ever in entire human history. The basis for this incredible technology is a force that controlled the very fabric of space and time.
They called it the greatest discovery in human history. But... They didn’t even image Alian creature called ‘Alien Species’ which are gurdians of the civilization. They are coming to destroy ‘Human’ to protect their civilization. And more dangeorus creatures ‘Extraterrestrial’are waiting outer space!

name: BeanKind by Ketnipz
description: Help Bean build a room and a team, and share love all over the world, just by tapping your screen!

name: Tokidoki Frenzies
description: The world's cutest friends are here! Global collaboration with fashion icon tokidoki characters appearing in a puzzle game for the first time! Meet the popular tokidoki characters in-game now!

name: Shuffle and K.O.
description: In this game, your goal is simple : knock all of your opponent's circles/polygons out of arena ! You may play with computers or other players at the same device.

name: Neon Run!
description:
Neon Run is an fast-paced, intense infinite runner game with a cool 80s retro style and soundtrack.
Dodge and jump to avoid the hazards and fly as far as you can. Shields and time distortion pickups are scattered along the way.
Submit your high score to the world leaderboard! Can you compete with the best?

name: RC Plane
description:
Fly and RC Plane through a realistic country side scenario.
Realistic flight, and great looking 3D graphics will amuse every kind of player.
Fly through a Barn, a windmill and some mysterious spots sparse trough the scenario.

name: Vext Edit
description: Sin descripción

name: Enigmash
description: Sin descripción

name: Hayaku! Island of Darkness
description: Explore a mysterious island full of dangers and uncover the secrets behind the anomalous creatures that inhabit it in this retro-style metroidvania.

name: Picture Poker
description: A standalone 1-4 player fangame of the Picture Poker minigame from New Super Mario Bros DS.

name: Rose From The Depths
description: A visual novel about the recovery of a woman traumatized by an abusive relationship.

name: Söldner: Secret Wars Remastered
description: Söldner! Enjoy third-person combat, make use of a fully destructible environment. Customize your character and start combat on the huge worldmap (6500*3500 km), selecting your gear from over 100 firearms. Get into battle the way you want by employing over 120 vehicles. Take your tour now!

name: Tikrace
description:
Parkour, cyberpunk, neon are what you get in the Tikrace. Run for your life and set new time records on various maps.
Tikrace brings unique and skill based movement to the table, highly inspired by classic FPS titles, set in a SCI-FI setting

name: Leo's Red Carpet Rampage
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombiax Evil
description: Survive as long as possible against the zombie horde of Zombiax Evil ! Alone or in coop mode, play as an elite soldier, arm yourself to the teeth and try to rid the whole of humanity of zombie vermin ! Become a Legend of the Resistance !

name: Sweet Summer World Challenge
description: Sweet Summer characters would like to welcome you to the one of the most adventurous towns! All the fun and excitement starts here! Make your way to the top of the map with “S” grade in each level and beat the world record!

name: Ding Dong Delivery 2: Pizza
description: The retro 'Paperboy' is all grown up and has graduated to delivering hot slices of pizza around town. Take control of a huge variety of vehicles, from tanks to boats and all in between. Dodge traffic and deliver as much food as you possibly can!

name: The World of Obert Skye
description: The World of Obert Skye is an adventure, puzzle solving game for current and future Obert Skye fans.

name: Defender of the Wood
description:
The realm is in peril! Nasty little Goblin-Things have been spotted massing in the forest. The King has assembled his best archers for training to prepare for the onslaught! Is it too little too late?

Test your skill! Find out what it takes to impress Lord Astirian and become... a Defender of the Wood. Take on the goblin horde and challenge your friends' hi-scores!
The King has also put out a grand bounty on the fearsome creatures. Make sure you upgrade your amor and weapons before taking the war to their dragon commander.

name: I Am Hero: AFK Teamfight
description: I Am Hero presents unique gameplay with the combination of idle RPG elements with the tactics of auto chess teamfight. Our AFK game lets you build a powerful team to auto fight on your behalf.

name: Underworld: The Shelter
description:
Through exploration of the cursed shelter, the human race has discovered powerful equipment, resources, and gene-altering data.
Your objective is to harvest these items of great human advancement and return to base safely.
Mankind has underestimated the number of monsters on it's quest for the cursed shelter.
A massive counterattack by the monsters has begun!
Stop the monster's attack that threatens the survival of mankind and stay alive to the end!

name: Star Defence
description: Star Defence is a unit-placement real-time tower defense game in which you can place any unit you like on a 2D free-form plane. All units in the game, including enemies, are composed of units you place. Place your units in a balance between enemies and allies to develop your civilization.

name: Greed and Grind
description: Hello guys I am bringing you this time around a small cozy little game about greed and grinding!! If you played my prevous games you should know what to expect! If you didnt... This is a small Idle game where the character battles autommatically while everything you do is drink a coffee.

name: Wrestle Bros
description: Step into the ring with Wrestle Bros, the ultimate 1v1 browser-based big show! Body-slam, clothesline, and suplex your bros and earn your way to victory! Whether you're playing solo or taking on a friend, locally or remotely, the action never stops!

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour - Ella
description: A playable character which can be unlocked in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour by connecting to its Game Boy Advance counterpart.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour - Neil
description: A playable character which can be unlocked in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour by connecting to its Game Boy Advance counterpart.

name: Kuplinov: Nightmares of The Past
description: Sin descripción

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sych story
description: Sin descripción

name: Retro Rocket Raiders
description: An old school fast action twin stick shmup, featuring more than 20 weapons that you can equip your ship with and 30 different enemies

name: Kam Thunder
description: Kam Thunder is a 2D platformer action-adventure game. It is a fast-paced project with a hack and slash style that requires constant movement, and a shallow story that focuses more on gameplay and effects.

name: Parallel Paths
description: Run, Jump, & Swing your way to the top. Beat the clock and collect Upgrades. Find your dimension before time runs out.

name: Air Race
description: A very rare prototype game. This game ran on the same hardware as "The Last Starfighter" (1984). Unfortunately, this game also suffered the same fate as the "The Last Starfighter" (1984). It was never released due to high cost of the hardware preventing the game being sold to the market. If released, it would have been the first space-themed racing game utilizing flat-shaded 3-D Polygons.

name: SystemCrash92
description: Face the machines of the evil hacker in this action roguelite. Your avatar will assist you in battle as you improve your skills with items and level up to build a powerful strategy. An unforgettable adventure for survival fans!

name: Bakkaniya
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: The Daring Lifestyle Bundle
description: Seek adventure - and adventurous fashion! - with this free bundle containing The Sims 4 Jungle Adventure Game Pack, The Sims 4 Luxury Party Stuff Pack, and The Sims 4 Fashion Street Kit.

name: Aeroplanes
description:
Get your wings and fly to victory in this fun game of strategy.
Command your small army of 3 war planes in fights against your friends via GameCenter or against "Frank", the smart brain we put inside your device for single player mode.
They say "lose sight, lose fight"! Not in this case. Games are turn based and progress is always saved. You can face many enemies at once in multiple online games like a brave soldier would.
Two types of planes are waiting on the runway. Choose between small angry planes or big powerful ones.

name: Fake Future
description:
What will happen when AI gains self-awareness and surpasses humanity?
What choices will humans make when faced with the appearance of a new energy "Icey"?
Countless complex clues point towards an unexplored "pixel" space - the [Fake Future].
The “future” it depicts is hazy yet mysterious, just like the desolation after the destruction of Earth, craving rebirth and exploration. Whether you're a fan of cyber-pixel style or a sci-fi fanatic, you won't want to miss this retro-futuristic pixel simulation game. Come and join us now!

name: Celestia Ultimate
description: Collect, train, and battle with Champions in this RPG built on Unreal Engine 5.

name: HeliVR Simulator
description: Learn, hone and master all the instruments and controls of a real helicopter in virtual reality! Follow the tutorials to turn the aircraft on and off, learn to use ropes and flares and apply your knowledge in any given situation.

name: Roots
description: Roots is a single-player, 3D narrative adventure that navigates the depths of fear and self-doubt.

name: Radio Exurbia
description: Radio Exurbia is a driving game about music and discovery as you explore a surreal landscape of twisted suburbs and sentient muscle cars. Use your Reality-Modulating radio to swap between worlds as you experience the stability of suburbia and the sublime excitement of the unknown, all set to a high-octane original soundtrack. Turn the key, tune in and swap worlds.

name: On the Fly!
description: On the Fly! is a cozy couch co-op party game where two players take on the roles of stage crew and attempt to ensure their production goes off without a hitch.

name: Nomad
description: Dance with danger in this frantic shooter, utiilizing an arsenal of movement options, weaponry, and tactical abilities.

name: The Mountain Calls
description: The Mountain Calls is a 2D puzzle platformer where the player takes on the role of a Feng Shui priest who uses elements from nature to repair broken incantations, preventing a disaster from befalling the village.

name: MOON: Metagalactic Observer - OmNipotent
description:
Welcome to MOON.

Extraterrestrial life has been detected, along with valuable resources. Gather Moonium Ores and MOON Artifacts, attack your opponent and defend yourself to ensure survival.

Caution: If you lose all your MOON Artifacts, you’re as good as dead.

Good luck, Player.

name: Starweave
description: Starweave is a narrative game that uses tactical RPG mechanics to tell an allegorical story about constricting roles within a cycle of oppression. Dramatic and bittersweet, you endeavor to make the world just a little bit kinder through your actions.

name: Swingggggg
description: Swingggggg is a 2D neon arcade game where you play as a pendulum and swing through endless levels using a unique physics-based mechanic.

name: Healing Beat
description: In Healing Beat, you are challenged to listen and learn the music of the plant, and match your movement to the rhythm.

name: Tofu Tower
description: Meet Tofu Tower. A living breathing apartment building located on a quiet city block. Life changes, though, when a freeway begins being built, and Tofu Tower is standing right in its way. The player’s goal is to find a new home for Tofu Tower and its residents, and explore what it means to be uprooted from one’s home.

name: Where the Sea Meets the Sky
description: Where the Sea Meets the Sky is a narrative-driven puzzle game about death and grief. Players take on the role of Susu as she uncovers a hidden secret held by Grandma after the passing of Grandpa. Susu will help Grandma work through her grief and come to a different understanding of death, drawing from her perspective and memories as a little child.

name: The Cleaner
description: The Cleaner is a 2D simulation game that immerses players in the challenges of game creation under extreme censorship policies. Players take on the role of lead designer, Lia, who must design her game while navigating team feedback and censorship regulations.

name: Worldship: A Board Game Edition
description: Worldship: A Board Game Edition is a role-playing area control board game about a group of children who are forced into competing against each other in a spaceship.

name: Chernobyl
description: Sin descripción

name: Chiaroscuro
description: Explore a whimsical world of light and shadow, while the blinking between black and white blurs the edge of reality…

name: Headbonk
description:
Navigating life can be awkward. Where are you going? What is the point of all this? What’s that stuck to my head? Relax. headbonk is an existential runner game that perfectly answers none of these questions.
In headbonk your goal is to keep moving — even when the stuff of life gets in the way. That ‘stuff’ literally sticks to your head, making you an increasingly absurd vehicle to move forward. If all else fails, kick back and watch headbonk play itself.

name: Oodee's Passion
description: Oodee's Passion is a coop crafting game set in North America during the last ice age. Oodee and his faithful spirit companion Doog have been ostracized from their tribe and find themselves in a strange land where nothing is at it seems. Players must explore, craft and solve puzzles in order to help Oodee & Doog earn their way back into the hearts of their tribe.

name: The Bookkeeper
description: The Bookkeeper is a cozy simulation game about learning the craft and mindset of book restoration. Using touch controls developed for iPad, experience the satisfying, tactile nature of book restoration as you methodically deconstruct and repair books (through tasks such as cleaning the cover, washing the pages and hanging them to dry, and unbinding/rebinding the pages) for a wide variety of customers.

name: The Seven Awakenings: I Randall
description: Run your own shop in the Middle Ages. Manage your economy and serve your customers well. Collect the elements to discover who you were in your previous life and fight off bandits if necessary. Unveil the veil of prophecies and discover your own secret.

name: VR Tribes: Non-VR Edition
description: VR vs PC. Show which player is stronger. VR TRIBES is an action-packed online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: Schoolmare
description: Schoolmare is a survival horror game where you fall in love with a teacher. But it was a trap… You need to get out of the school and not be killed by a horrible monster.

name: Spook Bowl
description: In Spook Bowl, lead your team of monstrous college athletes in a turn-based ball game like no other. Assemble a winning team with the unique abilities and stories of each character. Find your own way to score and unravel the enigmatic secrets of this university tournament.

name: No Legs? No Problem!
description: Be the first to reach the goal in this intense 4 player racing game. Challenge your friends to a free for all or team up in an epic 2v2 race battle. Use your abilities to grief your enemies, or boost yourself to the finish line.

name: Camelot: Wrath of the Green Knight - Collector's Edition
description: Camelot: Home of King Arthur’s court… and intrigue! When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for all…

name: Valhalla Wars
description:
Plan your attack!
This unique strategy game allows you to plan lines of attack for your army. You can bluff and deceive your opponents in real time. Watch as other players fall into your traps, and helplessly give ground to your brilliant strategies.
Build an army with dozens of unique units. Plan attacks together with your allies, and agree together on which strategic positions to conquer on the map.
You have never played anything like this! Deep, true strategy, in a convenient mobile package.

name: Flabby Santa
description:
Flabby Santa has dropped all of his presents while on a practice run for the big day!
Help him fly across the ever changing landscape of the North Pole and pick up his lost presents.
Along the way you can roll snowballs downhill to score bonus points. The further they roll the bigger they get and the higher the bonuses.
Avoid the obstacles, because Santa isn't wearing a helmet!
If he gets hit he'll drop all his presents first.
If he doesn't have any presents, it's Game Over!
High Scores are saved for the most presents collected and bonus points scored during a single level.
Every level is unique with increasing difficulty, meaning that no two games will be the same.
Easy to pick up, but difficult to master when the levels become more challenging.
Can you save the holidays?

name: Bowmaster 2: Archery Tournament
description: Bowmaster 2, the sequel to the immersive #1 worldwide hit archery game is finally here with a brand new free to play tournament! The Merry Five are back to reclaim the Bowmaster mantle so draw your bow, take aim and release your inner Robin Hood once again!

name: Sushi Cat Words
description: Sushi Cat is always looking for new tasty treats to fill its belly! In Sushi Cat Words, you'll find all sorts of mouth-watering sushi dishes for our rotund hero. You'd better have eaten plenty of brain food, though. The only way to feed that feline is by searching out words in hundreds of levels of puzzling fun. Find big words, small words, words that go up, words that go down, or words that go all the way around.

name: Miles From Tomorrowland: Missions
description: Get ready to take your space adventure to the next level as you outrun tidal waves and escape the Flickorax with Miles Callisto and his robo-ostritch best friend, Merc, from the new Disney Junior series, 'Miles from Tomorrowland!' Journey with Miles on rescue missions, and use cool tools and tricks to dodge asteroids, collect rare space rocks, and turbo boost your way through this blastastic deep-space race!

name: Classical Contraption
description:
The Classical Contraption helps you learn classic poetry in a fun and engaging way.
Each line of the poem is presented in the contraption one line at a time. The words are randomly scrambled differently each time. Simply select the words in the correct order.
Enjoy 100 year old poetry on a modern device styled to look like an old victorian steampunk contraption!
Selected poems are from a variety of compilations that will appeal to both young and old!

name: Bounda Forever
description: A lovely style of painting rogue-like games. In the game you face a tide of enemies, defeat them, and survive. The game offers many weapons to help you win. No long story, no ending, any time you can be reckless to a game.

name: Bomb Buddies
description: In Bomb Buddies, solve puzzles, crack codes, and test your dexterity with a friend...but watch out! Everything is not as it seems when a nefarious hacker gets involved. When the stakes are high can your skills still hold up to the test?

name: Neon City
description: Welcome to Neon City, a virtual reality city-building game that combines the charm of block toys with cutting-edge hand-tracking technology.

name: Valeria the Pagan Priestess
description: Valeria the Pagan Priestess is a savage and sexy celebration of old-school dark fantasy themes, modernized with visceral hack-and-slash combat!

name: 40 Winks
description: A cancelled version of 40 Winks, which was cancelled in an early stage and was never officially announced. A prototype was sold on the internet on 2021, being the first time it became publicly known.

name: Duel Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Hover Cross Skills
description: Hover Cross Skills is a Old School Top Down Racer which gives you opportunity to drive different Hovercraft. This is very exciting game with fun filled tracks in which you are able to drive the Hovercraft in beach,forest and rivers. The levels itself are very challenging and rewarding. Incredible physics engine makes the game look and behave realistically.

name: Hidden Objects Fantasy Games
description: Become overwhelmed by enchantment by playing this excellent fantasy game! It is a final hour to discover hidden things in beautiful pictures of fantasy world! Join the little forest fairy in this amazing mystic fantasy game! Let your imagination go wild while you lose yourself in awesome fairy tales of the enchanted forest!

name: Roamaor
description:
In Roamaor, the challenge is to combine characters into words.
The words of the puzzles are from poetry. You can feel the rhyme of poetry while solving the puzzles.
There are various kinds of monsters and obstacles blocking your way, so the strategy is crucial.

name: Candy Zero
description: 200 levels in one world. Complete one level, you can find a sweet cat and get coin. You can unlock more worlds.

name: Coin Factory Idle: Money Games
description: Meet Prof. Kruzenshtern, his incredible contraptions and talented friends on their quest to explore the world of mad science and build the ultimate factory. Mine for resources, fuel steam engines, launch drones and balloons - and gain income from all of this.

name: Legendary Blacksmith
description:
You can challenge to be a legendary blacksmith.
If you are sick of enhancement, now it is a turn to conquer it.

name: Metal Max Balls
description: Sin descripción

name: Ore Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Flappy Pixel!
description:
Easy, Simple but Addictive!
A tiny pixel flaps against the gravity to go through geometric obstacles in PIXEL world.
Tap and keep your only pixel moving forward. Or this fragile pixel will be bumped and scattered into minute particles.
Good luck!

name: Qrgan Quarter
description: Sin descripción

name: Overdrive Escape
description: Enter the neon-lit world of Overdrive Escape, 3D first-person shooter game that will test your skills. Explore randomly generated levels, fight against waves of enemies, and choose your weapons wisely. Play now and see if you have what it takes to make it out of the city alive!

name: Mr.T Survival
description: Mr.T Survival is a survival game set in the wild jungle of nature. Players take on the role of Mr.T, a backpacker on his travel journey who encounters an accident that leaves him stranded on a remote and unfamiliar island. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style

name: MX vs. ATV: Untamed
description: Sin descripción

name: The Revived Throne
description:
With the power of the dead, claim your rightful place in your throne, capture the despicable enemies, sign contracts with other lords, fight epic battles, and destroy anyone who stands in your way.
You lost everything because of an unexpected betrayal, but the power of the dead revived you and gave you a second chance. Rule your city and build an undead army, return to the battlefield, slay the traitors, send your army to sack their cities, destroy their army and capture their champions for your use! Real-time battles full of strategies will give you more than enough space to show your worth as a commander!

name: Touch Point Tennis
description: Win the match. Raise the trophy. Become the greatest! Do you have the reflexes, strategy, and tennis skill to defeat your rivals all year long?

name: Mary X
description:
Mary X is a fun, addicting puzzle game with original gameplay and great music, visual and story. It is addicting and so much fun. Combine numbers to make king and queen , make Queen Mary's dynasty continue..
The new version with a new game mode just like a new game. It will give you a totally different experience.

name: Heroes of Orn: Darkness
description: Inspired by Majesty, Heroes of Orn: Darkness is a fantasy base building RTS with a twist - you cannot directly control your units. Build and upgrade your kingdom to gain power and resources. Influence your heroes' decisions and empower them by issuing quests, casting spells, and creating shops.

name: Triviador World
description:
Triviador is a unique game genre that offers more than a simple quiz game. Conquer territories and attack castles while answering trivia questions. Test your knowledge and use your strategy skills.

You can join the competition, enter tournaments and gain a top place in the Rank Lists and reap the rewards!
Reach the highest League with a well-chosen strategy! Defeat your enemies and be a trivia champion!

Make a clan (or join one), play and chat with thousands of trivia fans. Invite your best friends for a friendly quiz match, rate player-submitted question, or create your own.

Customize your world - create a unique avatar, expand your village and upgrade your buildings for increased rewards and gold. Be creative while you expand your Empire of Knowledge!

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Tokyo
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Blocky Highway
description:
Blocky Highway is about racing traffic, avoiding trains, collecting cars and most importantly having fun. Collect coins, open prize boxes to get new cars and complete collections! Drive at full speed to score big and be the #1.
Crash time! Control your car after crash, hit traffic cars for extra score!

name: I, Gladiator Scratch'em
description: I, Gladiator Scratch'em is the prequel to the highly anticipated I, Gladiator full game. The Scratch'em game allows players to win points that lead to a special surprise that can be used in the full game.

name: Roald Dahl's Twit or Miss
description:
Every time Mr Twit eats, foulsome food flies towards Mrs Twit who is trying to sleep. Score by stopping the mouldy morsels hitting her. But watch out because if she wakes up she'll whack Mr Twit with her stick and then it's game over!
Psssst … here are a few tips to become a top twit!

name: Eyeser
description:
Eyeser is a brilliant puzzle game that will have you thinking in ways that you never had before.
Imagine that everything around you becomes invisible and there are 2 laser eyes will help you to see the object as single line. Imagine too that the line of laser scanning moved rapidly over the object, displaying tiny slices of the thing as it did so. Do you think you could guess what was showing on Eyeser just by viewing this one line?

name: Platform Tower
description: Can you jump?

name: General Staff: Black Powder
description: The General Staff: Black Powder Wargaming System is the ultimate in simulating 18th and 19th century battles. Built around the mate AI it comes with dozens of battles (Waterloo, Gettysburg, Little Big Horn (with alternative scenarios including Gatling guns), Antietam, and more.

name: Goremon
description: Explore and collect the powerful Goremons in a world where the energy of these creatures is everything. Make important decisions, and face dangers in a world full of mysteries and challenges. Goremon will take you on an epic adventure. Begin your journey in the world of Goremon!

name: Bonds of Unity
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter with parkour elements. Go all-out with 50+ different guns and tools or even create your own guns with the weapon editor. Combine your loadout with synergizing weapons to take down all sizes of enemies and to unite the fallen land of Utopia!

name: Inflorescences
description: A visual novel strategy game where your floral fragrances determine the fate of your mysterious shop and its patrons. Make choices, talk to customers, and shape the story. Get ready for a journey of heartfelt connections and strategic decision-making.

name: I'm In Charge
description: As "person in charge" in this game, you will travel to the scenes of classic negotiation events and become that crucial negotiator. Use your rhetoric to persuade the stubborn AI to give up their ideas.

name: Champions of Quortz
description: This is not another platformer! Champions of Quortz is a 2D Boss Rush that focuses on repeatable boss fights and loot & character progression. Hack, blast and smash through bosses that become stronger with each victory. Make your Champions stronger by leveling, upgrading and equipping loot.

name: Legion: Dead Metal
description: A secret government installation on a tropical island in international waters has gone dark LEGION has been sent in to investigate ,the installation was experimenting with a new power source and a mayday was received moments before contact was lost "Save yourself" was all that was heard

name: Haunted: The Chronicles
description: Immerse yourself in the horror of Haunted: The Chronicles in solo or up to 4 player co-op. Play as a paranormal influencer, unlock equipment to document supernatural events, solve puzzles, and stay alive against the dark forces that lurk in the shadows.

name: Milites Fortunae
description: Welcome to Milites Fortunae, a stategy game where you control a team of warriors! Take turns with your opponent as your warriors perform attacks known as Abilities, to deplete enemy units health and claim victory!

name: Vertical Quest
description: Climb the treacherous tower in Vertical Quest, a challenging rogue-like game where you control a hero, overcome obstacles, and defeat the ultimate boss at the top!

name: Dracula’s Vengeance
description: Simple and refreshing casual action game!

name: Unplug
description: Explore a dystopian world as a sentient TV Robot who plugs into robot bodies and objects in the environment to control them. Use their different abilities to overcome puzzles, help people and fight off an egomaniac tyrant.

name: Dimraeth
description: A fantasy topdown multiplayer RPG. Features a combination of 8 races and 6 classes. Explore new lands, trade with villages, upgrade runes, unlock new spells, craft, and more! Team with your friends to raid dungeons for special hidden rewards. Defend Dimraeth and choose your own destiny.

name: Hero Well
description: Hero Well is a grid-based roguelike RPG with a minimalistic aesthetic. Choose your hero, manage your resources, and prepare yourself to delve ever deeper into the unexplored wells to cleanse the vile beasts once and for all.

name: Chef: Cocktails & Drinks
description: Tired of serving soda to your customers? It’s time to reach a whole new dimension of beverages with Chef: Cocktails & Drinks! Ranging from fruity booze to overpriced creamy coffee, you will have a new wide array of options at your disposal to gently decrease your customers’ bank account!

name: Holy Ship
description: Get ready to battle other pirate ships on the high seas with Holy Ship - the ultimate local multiplayer party game!

name: Rogue Labyrinth
description: Fight through the ranks in a monster-filled labyrinth created by an egocentric billionaire colonist. Make friends (or enemies) with rivals, employees, fans, and monsters to improve your abilities. The crowd wants a show, so hype them up in this rogue-lite narrative adventure!

name: Trust Your Ears
description: You can see nothing, but you can hear something lurking in the darkness. Trust Your Ears is a unique mixture of on-rails shooter and audio horror game. Find all the key fragments and escape from the mysterious asylum.

name: Doomsday Derby
description: Play this indie derby game! destroy the cars that want to destroy you with a powerful gun and missiles in a battle arena. Avoid the chickens and destroy the giant worm from the aliens! loot the destroyed cars and more in this fun mini game for windows

name: NoirNet: The Neon Enigma
description: Dive into a neon-lit world of mystery with NoirNet – The Neon Enigma! Solve gripping cyberpunk murder cases in this immersive, episodic detective game!

name: Tuna The Cat
description: Inspired by side scrollers from the 80's and 90's, Tuna The Cat is a true jump style side scroller. With todays graphics and yesterdays playstyle it's a combination for fun. Jump, slide, and run your way through 20 stages of colorful 2.5D excitement.

name: Bail Force: Cyberpunk Bounty Hunters
description: Bail Force is an action roguelike about two bounty hunters in a cyberpunk setting. Play as one of two Bounty Hunters, and make your way to catch or neutralize dangerous criminals using various power-ups. Experience their missions and personal conflict stemming from concerns of a loved one.

name: Houchi City
description: Sin descripción

name: NFL Rivals: Football Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Killer
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle landmark!
description: Sin descripción

name: Ground Zero
description: Sin descripción

name: Yggdrasil 2: Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: Planes: Fire & Rescue
description: Cancelled port of Disney Planes: Fire & Rescue

name: Pinky
description: Sin descripción

name: Injection
description: A dynamic platformer with lots of blood and chaotic shooting. Unleash your desire for violence by killing crowds of enemies, hastily injecting yourself with another dose of experimental drug.

name: CloneZWars
description: Almost all humanity was wiped out by a zombie virus in a few days. But there is still hope thanks to a scientist breakthrough in cloning. Use those clones and their supernatural abilities to save survivors, secure buildings for them and restore the modern society.

name: Reborn Protocol
description: Reborn Protocol focuses in after the events of the "Rebirth Program" RB is a reimagining of the mod, "The Hidden" Heavily focusing on the Asymmetric Multiplayer aspects both sides will have to be cunning and sharp to come out on top.

name: Dead On Arrival
description: Dead On Arrival is a Crime Scene Investigation game where players must gather clues, use forensic equipment, and analyse the evidence discovered at the scene. Work with your friends to uncover who committed the crime, and convict the correct suspect on a wide range of different maps.

name: Underground22
description: 22 people awake and find themselves trapped in a game underground. To win, they must escape the world beneath our feet.

name: Georgie and Me
description: Assume the role of Jack Kursby, an intergalactic hired gun with his partner dog, Georgie. Together your skills will be strained against a most despicable enemy in a high octane story across the stars.

name: Camping Park Simulator
description: Become a campsite owner to bring people joy and unforgettable experiences! Be the first who dared to buy an abandoned park near Route 66. You're not afraid to get in the spirit of the story and decide to make sure the campsite is filled with lively, unusual tourists.

name: The Paradell
description: The Paradell is a third person, country-side adventure rpg where you harness elemental magic to farm, fight and explore the isolated and deceivingly cozy world of the Paradell. Explore the deepest catacombs and soar above the tree tops, gaining magical knowledge and helping shape the world.

name: Vandaan
description: Welcome to Vandaan, a post-apocalyptic game where you must explore an abandoned city built by robots to find out why it was abandoned. In this game, you play as an adventurer who immerses themselves in a fascinating world full of puzzles and secrets.

name: Keystone Titans VR
description: Keystone Titans VR is a VR Autobattler where units will need to be strategically selected and arranged to dominate your opponents. Outsmart the enemy with clever drafting, positioning, and economy management to form the strongest team.

name: Atganga: Spectacle for the Gods
description: A 4-player local party fighter with draft mechanics where no fight will ever feel the same. Everyone starts at the same basic level but grow in power upon drafting godly items. Build synergies, find the way you like to play and become the last viking standing in Atganga: Spectacle for the Gods.

name: Bit the Apple, So What?
description: A short musical theater play set in dystopian Eastern Europe, based on a biblical story.

name: Wind: A Journey to the Sky
description: Guide your sheeps to the sky so they become clouds. Explore stunning landscapes, meet intriguing characters and experience a poetic and relaxing journey in a world close to nature.

name: Paranormal Records
description: Paranormal Records is a next-generation horror game made on Unreal Engine 5. A unique narrative experience from the perspective of a video camera. The protagonist, the host of a TV show about the paranormal, is filming a report about a missing patient, in an abandoned hospital.

name: City Demolish
description: Sin descripción

name: Banana Yetti
description: Banana Yetti is an addictive and fast paced arcade game that will keep you on your toes. The game features a cute and adorable yeti character that the player takes control of.

name: Arcticide
description: Explore dangerous procedural cities and landscapes in this gritty survival FPS with roguelike elements. Face harsh environments, hostile mercenaries, and mutant horrors as you navigate a dying near-future Arctic.

name: Pet Sanctuary
description: Pet Sanctuary is a relaxing game where you take care of your pets. From feeding them fruit to choosing a favorite outfit, you take care of and nature your chosen pet in this bright and joyful world. Plus, with mini games like Snake and Simon Says, you can earn rewards that your pet will love.

name: Gunslinger
description: Gunslinger is an unreleased action adventure set in the old west, that was in development by Surreal Software in 2001 / 2002 for the Playstation 2.

name: Heartland
description: Heartland is a canceled PSP FPS about about a Chinese invasion of the United States.

name: Michijiro no Lucent: Maou Fukkatsu
description: 千年の時を経て復活した魔王とその娘達は 魔力を取り戻すために不思議な塔へと足を踏み入れます。 しかし そこで魔王軍一行を待っていたものとは…

name: Settle Gliese
description: A collaborative storytelling game set in a massive dangerous world. It’s a mixture of a roguelike and a text-based roleplaying game.

name: Pole Dancers XXX
description: Massage a hot pole dancer woman and put on a successful pole dance show.

name: Dummb
description: Dummb is a physics based VR game where you control other AIs, characters, avatars, vehicles and many other objects and use them to your advantage to solve unique, distinctive, and quirky puzzles and challenges.

name: Vexlands
description: Vexlands is a realm of surprises. Every newly opened space brings a surprise: loot, resources, dungeons, monsters and disasters! Build your village where you craft new equipment before you explore uncharted areas, and find relics that explain who came before and why these lands are cursed.

name: Moonbriar
description: Delve into a dark fantasy visual novel where evil isn't always as it seems. Make your choices and grow your skills to help determine who survives the Great Culling. Featuring the voice talents of Ralph Ineson, Simon Callow, Savannah Steyn, and more.

name: Inukari: Fateful Detour
description: The standalone addon for Inkuari - Chase of Desception with two new world and local multiplayer duel mode. Its a fast and smooth action jump & run game like in the good old days.

name: Fairy Hunter
description: Long ago, In this world kind of intelligent life -- fairy. At first humans and fairy lived in peace. I do not know when to start, part of the evil fairy began to hurt people. Human mages began to imprison and train fairy to cleanse their minds. This part of mages are called the Fairy Hunter.

name: Ominous Stew
description: Ominous Stew is a chaotic 1v1 action-cooking game! Duel in both Story and Versus modes with various cooking legends: Serve your guests with self-created dishes and ruthlessly corner your rivals with destructive Foodji attacks!

name: Bricks Crusher Breaker Ball
description: Break all the bricks in this awesome arcade!

name: Artificial Wings
description: The game focuses on the storyline and flying shooting. The protagonist's journey to explore the old world is cut short when her flying ship crashes on Whale Island. While repairing the ship, she encounters Lilliana and Ryan, caught in their conflicts, and uncovers causality and secrets.

name: E3pdr
description: In puppet control, find the largest amount of Easter Eggs as you fight for survival.

name: Yerba Buena
description: In Yerba Buena, a young woman makes a startling discovery that allows her to reshape reality. By hacking the surrounding world, she is able to manipulate the environment, turn the tables on her enemies, and save the world from destruction.

name: GateTail
description: GateTail is a colorful action-adventure strategy RPG with a comedic story-rich basis and multiple endings based on your choices to boot! Explore an alternate dimension to your own in the search for a lost friend while avoiding its UNIQUE inhabitants and solving the mystery of your being!

name: Stim
description: Created as a college project. In Stim you are the Captain of a spaceship exploring different planets, foraging for items, and crafting Stims to sell to aliens for credits. Upgrade your gear, decorate your ship, and buy new machines to speed up your process in this exciting VR game.
